title: Perseus in Pittsburgh
description: The ancient Greeks knew him as Perseus, but now he’s in Pittsburgh. Action, fighting, and none of that mushy stuff.
altHero: Rock Callahan as Perseus, a buff Black man with flat top dressed in Greek toga
alt1: women fanning Perseus with palm fronds
alt2: Perseus stopping a bus with his fist
alt3: Perseus about to throw a blonde woman like a javelin
alt4: Perseus, with winged sandals, confronting another dude in purple parachute pants
